Package oop.polymorph

Class TenDayVignette

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.polymorph.VignetteBase
      • oop.polymorph.TenDayVignette
  • public class TenDayVignette
extends VignetteBase
    The TenDayVignette class represents a ten-day vignette, extending VignetteBase. It provides functionality specific to ten-day vignettes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields declared in class oop.polymorph.VignetteBase

        kfzType, plate, startDate

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TenDayVignette​(java.util.Date startDate, java.lang.String kfzType)
      Constructs a TenDayVignette object with the specified start date and vehicle type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isValid()
      Checks whether the ten-day vignette is currently valid.
      java.util.Date validUntil()
      Calculates and returns the date until which the ten-day vignette remains valid.

        display, getEndOfDay, getPlate, isExpired

    • Constructor Detail

      • TenDayVignette

        public TenDayVignette​(java.util.Date startDate,
                      java.lang.String kfzType)
        Constructs a TenDayVignette object with the specified start date and vehicle type.
        Parameters:
        startDate - The start date of the ten-day vignette.
        kfzType - The type of the vehicle.

    • Method Detail

      • validUntil

        public java.util.Date validUntil()
        Calculates and returns the date until which the ten-day vignette remains valid. The valid until date is set to ten days after the start date.
        Specified by:
        validUntil in class VignetteBase
        Returns:
        The date until which the ten-day vignette remains valid.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Checks whether the ten-day vignette is currently valid. The ten-day vignette is considered valid if it is not expired and the start date is before the current date.
        Specified by:
        isValid in class VignetteBase
        Returns:
        true if the ten-day vignette is currently valid, false otherwise.
